snippet: Elliott Sadler took the lead after a late caution and held on down the stretch to win his first Nationwide race in 14 years Saturday at Phoenix International Raceway.
abstract: Elliott Sadler wins his first Nationwide auto race in 14 years at Phoenix International Raceway.
lead_paragraph: Elliott Sadler took the lead after a late caution and held on down the stretch to win his first Nationwide race in 14 years Saturday at Phoenix International Raceway.
